mapper.select: /* selectUserListForDownload */ SELECT user_no userNo, user_id userId, user_nationality_cd nationalityCd, user_nickname nickName, user_cash userCash , IFNULL((SELECT SUM(report_cash_amt) FROM USER_CASH_REPORT_TB WHERE report_tp_cd = 'CA03' AND cash_user_no = ut.user_no), 0) withdrawAmount , IFNULL((SELECT SUM(report_cash_amt) FROM USER_CASH_REPORT_TB WHERE report_tp_cd = 'CA02' AND cash_user_no = ut.user_no), 0) rewardAmount , y_card_num yellowCardNumber, r_card_num redCardNumber, IFNULL(r_card_expired_dt, '-') redCardExpiredDate FROM USER_TB ut WHERE user_nationality_cd = #{nationalityCd} ORDER BY user_no DESC
/* selectUserDetail */ SELECT y_card_num FROM USER_TB WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
/* selectRedCardNumber */ SELECT r_card_num FROM USER_TB WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
/* selectCurrentUserCash */ SELECT user_cash FROM USER_TB WHERE user_no = ${userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_CASH_REPORT_TB (cash_user_no, report_tp_cd, report_st_cd, report_cash_amt) VALUES (#{userNo}, 'CA09', 'CT02', #{reportCashAmount})
